name: Koohii Material (kanji)
description: A material theme for kanji koohii. It doesn't alter the layout, just the style. It also tries to follow the material guidelines as closely as possible.
additional_info:
This is very much a work in progress. Currently, only the review screen is affected and there is only a dark theme. I made this initial version in under 2 hours, so don't expect too much.

Planned features:
- White theme
- Theme for the rest of the page including the learn section
- SVG (font?) icons

Known Bugs:
- The summary screen is broken
- Readings are next to impossible to read
- Loading indicator is still blue and ugly
